xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/647569-A Question of Sunlight 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/kN6wev3H9uPWZuPfGdIBqhtW1Uz.jpg Linking 9/11 with the Holocaust via “the telling of memories” by visual artist José Urbach, witness to both. José speaks almost magically, from childhood to the present, and anywhere in between. Recorded in the shadow of the World Trade Center towers only months after their collapse A Question of Sunlight
